website_summaries.verdict: Star Wars: Battlefront is a decent shooter that injects a handful of gimmicks to keep the gameplay interesting. However a lack of variety in the maps, game modes, guns, and character development prevents the game from reaching its potential.
pros: Fantastic visuals capture the classic movie aesthetic
Large-scale battles are chaotic and exciting
Playable movie characters like Luke Skywalker and Emperor Sheev Palpatine add a dynamic twist to the gameplay
cons: Game feels simplistic and repetitive once the Star Wars novelty wears off

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for me.
customer_reviews.text: I don't get to play games often. Maybe a couple of times a week for an hour or so. However, I really enjoy the game. Though I can see how it could get uninteresting if you play quite often. This is the first game I have bought in about 8-10 years. However, I really like this one because there is no bad language and I don't have to worry about my kids walking in and seeing someone naked or blood and guts everywhere. It is very difficult to find clean, entertaining games (I know I am in a small minority). Overall, I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: UT Kilts

customer_reviews.title: this game is awesome! It's a bit too good in quality (my ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, my Bro has the Game already for the Xbox 1, and I said, "I gotta get this, only, for the PC!" I did, it was decently priced, (especially for the quality of the Game) it introduced me to a new Online Gaming Headquarters, (Origin) and needless to say, this game is awesome! It's a bit too good in quality (my PC slows considerably) and the game conveniently comes with options to better fit the demands of the computer's features. I do need to connect to the internet every once in a while to play it, (even if I want to offline) but I love this game. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: AnimeMan205

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: This game would load no matter what. Followed all the instructions to my fully compatible system with nothing. There are no tech hints for bypass, or way to contact. Furthermore, when you try to locate the game on the EA (origin) board, this game isn't even listed. Don't waste your time unless your build computers, hack systems or write programs...This game is not for everyone and is certainly not user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Can't give an fully accurate rating right now...
customer_reviews.text: The four stars is I didn't really have much difficulty in downloading the game and making an Origin account, but I probably should of checked the system requirements first. That's my bad. I apparently wasn't thinking much about my laptop's capabilities. I obviously got a little too excited, especially seeing all those cool mods being shown on YouTube. So when I eventually get a proper gaming laptop, I'll update this review... if I remember to.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jove

customer_reviews.title: but the matchmaking horrible. Whenever I try to play a multiplayer game
customer_reviews.text: This game has potential, but the matchmaking horrible. Whenever I try to play a multiplayer game, it goes into an empty or barely populated lobby and you have to wait 10-20 minutes for it to fill up. A simply server browser upgrade would do wonders and when one does join a lobby the ability to chat in it would be nice as well. People have been petitioning EA for a server browser since the games release, but they don't seem to care. I'm unlikely to buy an EA game again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would of been a more strategic game not just blasters. No real story nothing then why would I want to play this game on line? I don't want or need another MMO I won't ever buy another Battlefront game.
customer_reviews.author: David Disch

customer_reviews.title: returned it
customer_reviews.text: didn't work, and we were EXTREMELY disappointed. Download time over 24 hours, no hard cd,

customer_reviews.title: Hackers Paradise
customer_reviews.text: The game is nice looking that is all it has for it. Once you get online you have a massive hacking problem, and the game creators refuse to do anything about it. Would not recomend
customer_reviews.author: Michal Kierz

customer_reviews.title: You must have a newer beefy computer to run the software. And a very fast Internet connection to download the installation file
customer_reviews.text: I have not bought any computer games in a while. So when I bought this for my son, I assumed I would get an installation DVD. But you have to download about 70 GB install file. I have been on with technical support with EA games many times, just to find they don't know how to get it to work on my system. They told me to upgrade my computer

customer_reviews.title: Techical Support is nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: The program never worked, not at all and I have not received any response to many attempts for problems running the product. Repeated efforts have been ignored. I only got it to initiate on one occasion, but it quickly crashed during the start up video. Its not even started up since at all and even getting into "Origin" is fruitless, Avoid at all costs. A total waste of money and time.

customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this game. No physical disk and have to put in code to play off origin and sign up.Game updated and now says code won't work. Tried to contact origin and they put you on hold and are no help. Amazon will not give credit waste of money.Stay away.

customer_reviews.title: lots of problems just getting this game to play
customer_reviews.text: After a very long download a few days worth of reading on the net and messing with settings and updates on my pc i finally managed to get the game to start the black screen issue was very frustrating the game play is wonkie buggy and loopie but i have to admit its pretty fun when its running smooth but with all the nonsense i had to do just to get the game to play 5* isn't going to happen if you dont know your way around a computer this isn't the game for you

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Its a waste of time and money. I expected this would be a wonderful game. The levels are short, you see about 5 levels I guess and they are pretty pretty pretty short. You just need to shoot the enemies in a region, the region is pretty small again. There is nothing challenging in this game. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: This is deceptively marked. Yes, there's a tag ...
customer_reviews.text: This is deceptively marked. Yes, there's a tag that it's "download only." Yes, there is technically no overt deception involved. However, when you list three PC options - direct-to-account, download code, and regular 'ol PC, and when the latter option necessitates having something shipped to you, the implication is that you're getting a physical copy of the game. This is a really low move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It acts like those "free" app games that require in game purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Over hyped. Over priced. On top of that EA wants more of your money. It acts like those "free" app games that require in game purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Not me

customer_reviews.title: If they had just kept it simple...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks Amazing, has many weapons from the lore, has a lot of cool character skins, and sound effects are spot on. Cons: Maps are very unbalanced, lack of rebel vehicles, cards change the dynamic of the game too much(whats the point of walking when everyone has a jet-pack?), spawns are absolutely atrocious, and no story. If they had just kept the gameplay mechanics simple, and had added a small story(5-6 hour); it would have been much better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is just a game code which requires an additional membership. I thought I was receiving an actual disc for the computer. My return was refused with explanation that it had been opened and was described correctly. They can see that the code was never activated. I feel very disrespected and taken advantage of. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good multi-player game, single player option is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice graphics, weapons, and special abilities. BIG NEGATIVE...No single player campaign, just different levels of solo survival, NO story. May be a good multiplayer game but I find those populated with veteran "serious" players who make playing un-enjoyable. If you are looking for what was advertised, the single player portion of this game is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Neis

customer_reviews.title: ORIGIN is terrible, do not buy!

That being said, this is the first time I have had the misfortune of purchasing a game that runs on the Origin client, I do not ever plan to purchase another game that runs on Origin again. The game itself is mediocre at best.

Expected a dvd, Tried to set up account with Origin but once I forgot password, although both EA and Origin said they would, they did not send me a reset message. Many attempts failed so I will write this off as a wasted of time and money.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cheaters
customer_reviews.text: Too bad this game was taken on by EA. I've played computer games since the Apple II was around and I've never seen so many cheaters in a game. EA seems to be synonymous with easy hacks. I'll never again purchase an EA game.

Very weak game, not worth it even for $19.99.

You don't immediately die in two seconds from a high-flying bow caster any more. I would recommend this game to anyone who loves FPS and Star Wars.

customer_reviews.title: Sure the game looks great, but if you're on PC you can't even ...

No single player campaign to speak of. Sure the game looks great, but if you're on PC you can't even get into a semi-full match the majority of the time. Not worth the money at present.

Got bored after 2 hours of play and EA decided to release the game early so DLC [downloadable content] is the only way you can unlock the rest of the game. Bummer that each DLC is almost half the price of the game. Total money grab by EA. The only thing good about this game is the visual experience.

customer_reviews.title: Multiplayer is FREE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game here and it got home in 2 days.. Of course.. I'm an amazon prime member. Then I never had a chance to play it for real Cuz I'm constantly busy. But I finally could find some time to play it today.. And for my surprise... I played the online multiplayer option for free! So idk if that's happening Cuz it's my first time playing online or what... An "trial" option didnt even pop up on my screen like on PS4.. A credit card option was never presented... So .. Whatever it is.. IM FREAKIN PLEASED!! Thank you Amazon and Origin for this badass game 👏👍😂

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Beware, No Discs Included if you select the PC version!
customer_reviews.text: I work abroad and have very slow and sometimes limited internet connection to download large files, I bought this PC edition thinking I was going get the Discs so I would only have a small amount of files to download. I opened what was a game case that said DOWNLOAD ONLY-NO Discs included! I paid for them to send me a game case with product key and have to try and download over 60 gb game. Disappointing that its probably going to take over 1 month to download now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel jipped.
customer_reviews.text: Mistake #1 -- I bought this without realizing that it was a CD-rom Game BOX with a code to download the game, and not a set of game disks. Mistake #2 -- I should've read the customer Q&A section a little closer, where I might've seen how long it would take to download/install this game from its host site, Origin. Now I must wait 14 hours+ for it to download, despite my high speed internet and fast computer.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Reader

customer_reviews.title: Check Your PC Specs Before You Buy
customer_reviews.text: Check your computer specs before you purchase this item. You need 8 GB of ram plus a potential upgrade of your video card and C{U. I bought this for a grandson with a two-year old computer and he couldn't run the game without upgrading his computer or purchasing a new one, so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: the previous Battlefront game was more fun. That being said
customer_reviews.text: $60 bucks and I don't get a freakin' disc? Furthermore, the previous Battlefront game was more fun. That being said, this game isn't terrible. This game plays a little like Call of Duty and I don't care for that. I want to be in an imaginary worled in campaign mode, getting in and out of cool vehicles while changing uniforms as needed. I have been deprived of this.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Maglio

customer_reviews.title: A real letdown
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. No campaign. Brief missions are boring and pointless. I'm not a real online game guy though.
customer_reviews.author: nowhereman

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo slow to download
customer_reviews.text: EA Origin content distribution network......horrible. Appears via resource monitor bandwith segment rates capped had I reviewed forums with respect to download i.e. [...] I would not have purchased download code forum post to increase speed .ini [connection] EnvironmentName=production [Feature] CdnOverride=akamai Also DNS 8.8.8.8 8.8.8.4 No help hit or miss as posted in forums New computer thought I test out graphics. I guess on hold till download completes started around 5pm yesterday at 13% complete time remaining 134:41:12 hours

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came great! Battlefront itself has gotten a little better since launch I would totally recommend it for $20!

customer_reviews.title: EA going down hill
customer_reviews.text: Stupid is as stupid does? No physical copy. Why just buy a box? I did not realize it till I received my empty box. I did not open it but I did return. I only buy physical copies because I have satellite internet. Next time I will read the whole description. EA going down hill. From what I read from reviews I am glad I returned.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Changed to download only AFTER pre-order. Not notified.
customer_reviews.text: My internet speed is 64KB/s on a good day. The "download only, no disc included" was added to the listing AFTER I pre-ordered (I used archive.org to make sure I wasn't crazy), yet I was not notified and asked if I still wanted it. If the game is about 40GB and I average 24KB/s, I'll let you work out the math on when I could actually play this game, assuming no download errors.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it zero start - bought this for my son. It does nothing but crash - I've updated drivers, been digging through the forum help and nothing helps - can't get a real time chat session with anyone to get help. Forum content is riddled with problems - and precious few "solutions" - the ones provided don't solve anything. How do I get a refund for this piece of crap?
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Although the environments and mechanics are really spectacular, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the environments and mechanics are really spectacular, it just lacks in about everything else. There is no story. There is no real objective to work towards. Also, as can be expected with EA, players are required to download their origin software just to download the game. Thanks EA, you continually ruin my childhood even into my adult years!!

customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS - DOWNLOAD IMPOSSIBLE ; ORIGIN / EA account , +"Redeem Product Code", then 1.Launch the Origin client, 2.Log in to your EA Account, 3.Navigate to My Game Library, found the game (as instructed) BUT NO DOWNLOAD POSSIBLE !!! Just "Play on Origin", then "Download , Install, Launch, Sign In THE STUPID Origin" AGAIN = vicious circle !!! DAMN DOWNLOAD IS JUST MISSING !... Maybe was there and now is gone. The problem is I PAID THE SELLER / EA FOR NOTHING !!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Avoid PC version of this game!
customer_reviews.text: This game had a lot of potential, and was enjoyable for the first 1-2 hours. After that, wow so terrible. The main issue with this game is aimbot hackers. Soon as you spawn, you die from someone across the map. The game experience is just so terrible because of this. Read EA forums, and you will see it is not an isolated incident. There are many groups of people returning this game due to this issue. If you want to play it, get it for XBOX or PS4 because I don't think there are the same issues there.

customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Marie Cook

customer_reviews.title: I would love to play this on my laptop but I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I would love to play this on my laptop but I keep video errors. The same happened on my desktop computer which was corrected by adding a video card,
customer_reviews.author: John R Benavides

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 2 days downloading on Christmas and it would never work on my computer. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: poor game
customer_reviews.text: No overhead map, the game forces you to lose bases you fought to defend because the "battlefront" has moved forward. Clunky shooting mechanics, blasters feel like you are shooting a pellet gun at wood rather than an enemy soldier... A blaster should shoot someone dead in a couple of shots not take 10 shots. Air mechanics are strange, there isn't really dog fights, just lock on and fire; it's so simple even a half retarded chimp could do it!
customer_reviews.author: Ikihi

customer_reviews.title: U know what it is
customer_reviews.text: Runs on high 4790 960 2gb and 8 gb ram. The game is what it is an arcade type fps in star wars. Other games are better but staring face to face with vader. Nope
customer_reviews.author: NastyPoet

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift to a kid
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game to get for kids. My son loves it and graphics looks a lot nicer than the older Star Wars games.
customer_reviews.author: Seng Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game but you need a gaming PC for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy this as a present however it is for a download only. I was extremely disappointed that it did not include the discs
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Vardon

customer_reviews.title: It does not work. Even following the instructions for ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. Even following the instructions for downloading instructions to allow it to be used on windows 10 does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. not worth full retail price.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok... just something to pass the timet. Some of the background graphics are great. The action graphics need improvement. The game focuses more on multiplayer than on missions and a story line; comparable to Titanfall. Gets old quick.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by empty box!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke. The only thing that arrived was a box with instructions on how to download the game online. Why bother sending us a box when an email would work just as well? We expected a DVD...
customer_reviews.author: S. Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome game <3 <3 <3 came in so fast! great condition!
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

customer_reviews.title: BLACK SCREEN with only sound working!  What is the deal with this game!!  Unplayable!
customer_reviews.text: BLACK SCREEN with only sound working! What is the deal with this game!! Unplayable!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this here, there is nothing in the box
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this here, there is nothing in the box-- No disk, no docs this is a box with noting more than a piece of paper with a code telling you to go to Origin and download the game!. Skip this--Just go to Origin and buy it there and you can download it play right away--without waiting for a code to come in the mail, geesh! BTW- Great game! Superior graphics, solid FPS with a heavy Star Wars Theme. Play as heroes, fly X-Wings, gather rank through XP and use credits earned in game to "level" or buy new blasters and appearances. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: hack fest mainiea like ALL ea games
customer_reviews.text: This game is completely hacked out like ALL EA games are
customer_reviews.author: Erick Osterloh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game but sometimes is difficult to find a full lobby to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Star Wars: Battlefront - Standard Edition - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:StandardImmerse yourself in your Star Warsbattle fantasies.

Feeling the ominous thud of an AT-AT stomping down on the frozen tundra of Hoth. Rebel forces firing blasters as Imperial speeder bikes zip through the lush forests of Endor. Intense dogfights between squadrons of X-wings and TIE fighters filling the skies. Immerse yourself in the epic Star Wars battles you always dreamed of and create new heroic moments of your own in Star Wars Battlefront 

Fight for the Rebellion or Empire in a wide variety of multiplayer matches for up to 40 players, or in exciting challenges inspired by the films available solo, split-screen or through online co-op. Star Wars Battlefront combines this epic action on a galactic scale with stunning visual recreations of some of the most iconic planets, weapons, characters, and vehicles in the Star Wars universe and the original sound effects from the films, to give Star Wars fans the ultimate, authentic and immersive interactive experience they been looking for.

The Most Immersive and Photorealistic Interactive Entertainment Experience


 * Visit classic planets from the original Star Wars trilogy, detailed with an unprecedented amount of realism and sense of authenticity that will transport you to a galaxy far, far away
 * Experience amazing digital replicas of the original Star Wars movie models, brought to lifelike fidelity by DICE use of photogrammetry technology

 Ground-based Combat on a Galactic Scale


 * Engage in epic battles on iconic planets including Hoth, Endor, and Tatooine. Also, bring the fight to the previously unexplored planet, Sullust
 * Pilot a diverse set of ground-based vehicles including nimble speeder bikes, massive AT-ATs, and more



 Master the Battlefront with Iconic Star Wars Characters 


 * Play as some of the most memorable characters in the Star Wars universe including Darth Vader and Boba Fett
 * Encounter a variety of beloved characters from the original trilogy such as C-3PO and R2-D2 (93)



 Take to the Skies in Epic Star Wars Dog Fights


 * Pilot the Millennium Falcon, X-wings, TIE fighters, and more of your favorite vehicles in exhilarating aerial combat



 Made for Jedi and Padawans Alike


 * Battle alongside your friends online or in offline split-screen Co-op mode
 * Seamlessly swap between 1st person and 3rd person views


STAR WARS 2015 Lucasfilm Ltd. All rights reserved. Game code and certain audio and/or visual material 2015 Electronic Arts Inc.
feature_bullets: Visit classic planets from the original Star Wars trilogy, detailed with an unprecedented amount of realism and sense of authenticity that will transport you to a galaxy far, far away
Pilot a diverse set of ground-based vehicles including nimble speeder bikes, massive AT-ATs, and more
Encounter a variety of beloved characters from the original trilogy such as C-3PO and R2-D2
Pilot the Millennium Falcon, X-wings, TIE fighters, and more of your favorite vehicles in exhilarating aerial combat
Battle alongside your friends online or in offline split-screen Co-op mode
Product Packaging Notice: This product includes a download code in packaging, no physical media disc included.
